headline.print_headline: Yahoo's 3Q Earnings Soar on Alibaba Windfall
headline.main: Yahoo's 3Q Earnings Soar on Alibaba Windfall

lead_paragraph: Yahoo's third-quarter earnings soared as the Internet company collected a huge windfall from Alibaba's recent IPO. Revenue also rose slightly from the previous year, a welcome change for a company that has been posting quarterly declines for most of the past five years.
